name: The Web
description:
Has this ever happened to you?

You wake up in the middle of the night and you can't go back to sleep, so you grab your phone but everything on there is a little too stimulating. OR

You're really nervous about something, so you try to distract yourself, but you can't actually concentrate on anything so you end up opening and closing the same tabs aimlessly. OR

You kind of want to go to the museum but you can't be bothered to actually get on a bus.

If so, this is the game for you!

The Web is a collection of twenty little exhibits composed of random texts, photos, poems, drawings, biological specimens, etc. Most were sourced from public domain archives. Some exhibits are interactive; others are not. Some of them may be mildly interesting, but none of them are all that exciting. This is a place to browse until you feel sleepy, or relax, or calm down, or just get bored. 

Click the "NEXT" button in the sidebar to browse through exhibits.
